thread.title: BRIEF-DMV Says Uber Indicated Will Not Renew Current Permit To Test Autonomous Vehicles In California

title: BRIEF-DMV Says Uber Indicated Will Not Renew Current Permit To Test Autonomous Vehicles In California
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - California Department of Motor Vehicles:
* CALIFORNIA DEPARTMENT OF MOTOR VEHICLES SAYS UBER INDICATED IT WILL NOT RENEW ITS CURRENT PERMIT TO TEST AUTONOMOUS VEHICLES IN CALIFORNIA
* CALIFORNIA DMV- ON CURRENT PERMIT TERMS, UBERâ€™S AUTHORITY TO TEST AUTONOMOUS VEHICLES ON CALIFORNIA PUBLIC ROADS WILL END ON MARCH 31, 2018
* CALIFORNIA DMV - UBER INDICATED IT HAS SUSPENDED AUTONOMOUS VEHICLE TESTING OPERATIONS INDEFINITELY IN ARIZONA, CALIFORNIA, PENNSYLVANIA, TORONTO
* CALIFORNIA DMV- PRIOR TO RESUMING AUTONOMOUS VEHICLE TESTING OPERATIONS IN CALIFORNIA, UBER MUST APPLY FOR A NEW TESTING PERMIT Further company coverage:
